level.heading: Second degree sexual abuse of a minor.
level.text: Whoever, being 18 years of age or older, is in a significant relationship with a minor and engages in a sexual contact with that minor or causes that minor to engage in a sexual contact shall be imprisoned for not more than 7 1/2 years and may be fined in an amount not to exceed $75,000, or both.
